definition: Daqing prefecture-level city in Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China

Daqing prefecture-level city in Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China

sentences.english: And this regional satellite aerial map presents the whole Daqing municipality.
sentences.chinese: 這副地域衛星航拍圖，將整個大慶市域呈現在您面前。

sentences.english: Through this pipeline, crude oil flows from Daqing to Beijing in a steady stream.
sentences.chinese: 大慶石油通過這條輸油管源源不斷地流往北京。

sentences.english: Chemical plant blast kills at least 9 in Daqing.
sentences.chinese: 大慶一化工廠發生爆炸，至少九人死亡，原因不明。

sentences.english: My homeland is the beauty of the oil city of Daqing.
sentences.chinese: 我的家鄉是美麗的油城大慶。

sentences.english: The staff chorus of Daqing Patrol Chemical Complex was set up in1990.
sentences.chinese: 大慶石油化工總廠職工合唱團組建於1990年。

sentences.english: I love the homeland, I love Daqing.
Pyrite and quartz are the main gold bearing minerals in Daqingling gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黃鐵礦和石英是大慶嶺金礦的主要載金礦物。

sentences.english: The west part of central Daqing Oilfiled was chosen as a dense well pattern development test region.
sentences.chinese: 選擇大慶油田中區西部爲密井網開發試驗區。

sentences.english: Images can be seen clearly in the background panels "Daqing City" word.
sentences.chinese: 圖片背景展板中清晰可見到“大慶市”字樣。

sentences.english: Daqing oil field is the main oil base of China.
sentences.chinese: 大慶油田是國家油氣供應的重要基地。

sentences.english: But in Beijing today they were celebrating an opening, and doing so in some style.
sentences.chinese: 但是今天北京正在舉行一場頗有格調的開業大慶。

sentences.english: QC Group of Technology, the Seventh Oil Production Plant, Daqing Oilfields.
sentences.chinese: 大慶油田第七採油廠工藝QC小組。

sentences.english: Lamadian oil field in Daqing is the largest gas cap oil field developed in China.
sentences.chinese: 大慶喇嘛甸油田是我國目前開發的最大一個氣頂油田。

sentences.english: Now, in sum, there are over 5000 wells of casing failure.
sentences.chinese: 現在大慶油田套損井總數已高達5000多口。

sentences.english: Daqing Yutai Fire Control Technology Co. , LTD. lies in High-Tech Development Zone of Daqing.
sentences.chinese: 大慶市羽泰消防科技有限公司坐落於大慶市高新區。
